== Description ==
Burning Hell is and 32 Level wad for zdoom bringing mixed levels from two authors Davij086 and Gamebursts Both new to Zdoom Editing. Burning Hell takes advantage of Acs with cutscenes and dynamic effects across maps.
== Story ==
You wake up to the sound of bullets you peer down the corridor blood splattered everywhere. You look as an demon warps in sending a ripple throughout the base machines turn off and computers beep messages. The demon appeared to have come for two marines, you and your cellmate. You clench your fist and punch the demon killing it instantly.
You grab a pistol and run through an teleporter leading to the hangar.
Demons appear before you not attacking you are blinded by hell itself you see blood, souls and ultimately death itself you open your eyes to appear in the middle of an fight in the hangar.
Bring it on!
== Other ==
This WAD also uses a variety of monsters and textures from around the community literally showing them off in all there glory also using customized versions like Mini Caco Lich or Brute Baron Of Hell.
